com.tinkerpop.gremlin.server

Class Graphs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.Graphs

  • public class Graphs
extends Object
    Traverser of Graph instances configured for the server to be passed to sessionless bindings. The Graph instances are read from the Settings for Gremlin Server as defined in the configuration file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Graphs(Settings settings)
      Create a new instance using the Settings from Gremlin Server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commitAll()
      Commit transactions across all Graph objects.
      Map<String,Graph> getGraphs()
      Get a list of the Graph instances and their binding names as defined in the Gremlin Server configuration file.
      Bindings getGraphsAsBindings()
      Get the graphs list as a set of bindings.
      void rollbackAll()
      Rollback transactions across all Graph objects.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Graphs

        public Graphs(Settings settings)
        Create a new instance using the Settings from Gremlin Server.

    • Method Detail

      • getGraphs

        public Map<String,Graph> getGraphs()
        Get a list of the Graph instances and their binding names as defined in the Gremlin Server configuration file. This Map is immutable.
        Returns:
        a Map where the key is the name of the Graph and the value is the Graph itself

      • getGraphsAsBindings

        public Bindings getGraphsAsBindings()
        Get the graphs list as a set of bindings.

      • rollbackAll

        public void rollbackAll()
        Rollback transactions across all Graph objects.

      • commitAll

        public void commitAll()
        Commit transactions across all Graph objects.
